item.description:
Darrick and I plan to spend a nice day outside after all this rain with our non-raptured friends.  Let's enjoy "surviving" the "Rapture of 2011" in nature.

Click on the following link for more information; Great Brook Farm State Park.

Darrick and I are planning to bring few snacks/drinks, small grill for some hot dogs and/or veggie burgers.  We have a few outside games we'll bring along.  Any food/drinks picnic types items will be greatly appreciated.  I wanted to make sure the weather seemed decent before more details. Bring a jacket as it doesn't seem to be too warm (low 60's), however little chance of rain! :)    

Lindsay and Darrick
item.name: Post Rapture Picnic
